A

askTheGame(String) - Method in class server.controller.Controller
Translates incomming strings to commands for the game

C

Controller - Class in server.controller
This class designed in order to completely handle string messages between clinets and their game and It will handle possible exceptions and prepares a nice and easy response to all messages from clients.
Controller(String) - Constructor for class server.controller.Controller
Constructs the controller object

F

Finish the game, the scores will be 0 and no words selected.

guess(String) - Method in class server.model.Hangman
If the client makes a guess on a char, then server looks into the chosen word and replaces the free places with the guessed char.

P

Player - Class in server.net
The Player class is responsible for running the whole game for the assinged client and ask the game the inputs from client connection and send the asnwer back to the client.
